name: Portfolio_Hana_Barley_Tan_Trellis_Wingback_Chair_and_Ottoman_Set
reviews: Because I have an acid reflux disorder, I can no longer lie down on the couch after meals. So this chair is a comfortable way to watch television or read in the evenings. And I love the way it looks!
Like the chair though I thought the back would be higher. For the price,it is a nice chair though.
description: The Portfolio Home Furnishings Hana chair and ottoman set features upholstery in a durable barley tan and white trellis pattern fabric. Update your home decor with the elegance and luxury of this rounded arm transitional wingback chair and ottoman.Furniture Pattern: GeometricProduct Features: Ottoman IncludedChair Type: Arm Chairs, Accent Chairs, Chair & Ottoman Sets, Wingback ChairsStyle: TransitionalMaterial: Polyester BlendAssembly: Assembly RequiredChair Back Height: High BackColor: White, TanStyleTransitionalMaterialPolyester BlendChair TypeAccent Chairs, Arm Chairs, Chair & Ottoman Sets, Wingback ChairsAssemblyAssembly RequiredChair Back HeightHigh BackColorTan, WhiteFurniture PatternGeometricProduct FeaturesOttoman Included
